update.description:
curl is failing some times to download big files. Use wget instead. Also use quiet options for tar and wget.

Failing before:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64&build=22)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64/22/) [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros\_gazebo\_pkgs-install\_pkg\_stable\_ros\_melodic-bionic-amd64/22](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64/22)

With this PR:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64&build=24)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64/24/) [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros\_gazebo\_pkgs-install\_pkg\_stable\_ros\_melodic-bionic-amd64/24/badge/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_stable_ros_melodic-bionic-amd64/24/badge/)
